meta.description: Optimize the number of plush toys and dolls to buy and sell to maximize profit under budget and sales constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products sold in the toy store.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost to the store for each product.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each product to buy and sell.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling plush toys and dolls.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total cost of inventory must not exceed $700.

constraints.name: plush_toys_minimum_sales
constraints.description: At least 90 plush toys are sold each month.

constraints.name: plush_toys_maximum_sales
constraints.description: At most 190 plush toys are sold each month.

constraints.name: dolls_sales_limit
constraints.description: The number of dolls sold is at most twice the number of plush toys sold.
